section.title: The OFBiz Setup Create First Customer help screen.
section.para: The First Customer screen provides create/edit the first customer of your organization and also setup the "Shipping Destination Address" , "General Correspondence Address", any telephone numbers, and email addresses you want for your first customer.

section.title: How do I update the profile information of the first customer?
section.para: After the first customer is created the profile and contact information screen will be displayed

listitem.para: Select the 'Update' button on the top corner of the profile information and the screen will be displayed: Any existing information will be displayed in the box
Amend the details in the profile information that needs to be updated
Press the 'Cancel/Done' button for go back to the first customer screen
